name: Lost (itch) (ItDill)
description:
Lost is a prototype created in 3 hours and is built on the player starting with little to no knowledge on how to complete the game. You are alone.

Theme: Alone

Constraints: Non-Violent, Must have walls (best constraint lol)

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

A and D to roll

Z to jump

Z to wall jump (while sliding on a wall)

Platformer engine created by ZBG
